hadith.text: Narrated Sayyar:"I was walking with Thabit Al-Bunani. He passed by some boys, so he said Salam to them. Then Thabit said: 'I was with Anas when he passed by some boys and gave the Salam to them, and Anas said: I was with the Prophet (ï·º) when he passed by some boys and he gave the Salam to them
